snippet: South Carolina Gov. Nikki Haley said Monday that she would not appoint a "placeholder" to fill temporarily the Senate seat made vacant by the retirement of Senator Jim DeMint.
abstract: South Carolina Gov. Nikki Haley said Monday that she would not appoint a "placeholder" to fill temporarily the Senate seat made vacant by the retirement of Senator Jim DeMint.

headline.main: S.C. Governor Rules Out a 'Placeholder' Appointment to Replace DeMint
